014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.internal;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Method;
017import java.util.Arrays;
018import java.util.Optional;
019import java.util.function.Function;
020import java.util.stream.Collectors;
021
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.JdbiOptionals;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.UtilityClassException;
024import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.SqlBatch;
025import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.SqlCall;
026import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.SqlQuery;
027import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.SqlScript;
028import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.SqlScripts;
029import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.statement.SqlUpdate;
030
031public class SqlAnnotations {
032    private SqlAnnotations() {
033        throw new UtilityClassException();
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * Returns the <code>value()</code> of the <code>@SqlBatch</code>, <code>@SqlCall</code>, <code>@SqlQuery</code>,
038     * <code>@SqlUpdate</code>, <code>@SqlScripts</code>, or <code>@SqlScript</code> annotation on the given method if declared and non-empty; empty otherwise.
039     *
040     * @param method the method
041     * @return the annotation <code>value()</code>
042     */
043    public static Optional<String> getAnnotationValue(Method method) {
044        return getAnnotationValue(method, value -> value.isEmpty() ? null : value);
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * Returns the <code>value()</code> of the <code>@SqlBatch</code>, <code>@SqlCall</code>, <code>@SqlQuery</code>,
049     * <code>@SqlUpdate</code>, <code>@SqlScripts</code>, or <code>@SqlScript</code> annotation on the given method if declared; empty otherwise.
050     *
051     * Note: <code>@SqlScripts</code> values are mapped individually and concatenated with {@code " ; "}, hence the transformation parameter.
052     *
053     * @param method the method
054     * @param transformation the String transformation (e.g. SQL lookup) to apply to the found value(s)
055     * @return the annotation <code>value()</code>
056     */
057    public static Optional<String> getAnnotationValue(Method method, Function<String, String> transformation) {
058        return JdbiOptionals.findFirstPresent(
059            () -> Optional.ofNullable(method.getAnnotation(SqlBatch.class))
060                .map(SqlBatch::value)
061                .map(transformation),
062
063            () -> Optional.ofNullable(method.getAnnotation(SqlCall.class))
064                .map(SqlCall::value)
065                .map(transformation),
066
067            () -> Optional.ofNullable(method.getAnnotation(SqlQuery.class))
068                .map(SqlQuery::value)
069                .map(transformation),
070
071            () -> Optional.ofNullable(method.getAnnotation(SqlUpdate.class))
072                .map(SqlUpdate::value)
073                .map(transformation),
074
075            () -> Optional.ofNullable(method.getAnnotation(SqlScripts.class))
076                .map(SqlScripts::value)
077                .map(scripts -> Arrays.stream(scripts)
078                    .map(SqlScript::value)
079                    .map(transformation)
080                    .collect(Collectors.joining(" ; "))),
081
082            () -> Optional.ofNullable(method.getAnnotation(SqlScript.class))
083                .map(SqlScript::value)
084                .map(transformation)
085        );
086    }
087}
